name: Sour Ape
description: Another finely crafted strain by Colorado growers at Joseph Arthur Botanicals, Sour Ape is an 80/20 indica-dominant hybrid cross between the legendary Sour Diesel and Grape Ape. With fast-acting, long-lasting cerebral effects, Sour Ape is very popular among medical patients. Hints of purple peek through from under a heavy blanket of crystal resin, and its aroma is just as enticing. Sweet fruity flavors soured by pungent diesel notes introduce Sour Apeâ€™s potently uplifting effects powered by a THC content that averages between 20-26% THC.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Giggly, Hungry, Energetic, Happy, Pain, Stress, Headaches, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
